issues.title: Appendix A referenced but not included
issues.description: Document references 'Appendix A' for proprietary scoring model, which is essential for implementation but not included
issues.original_text: proprietary scoring model detailed in Appendix A
issues.suggested_fix: Include Appendix A or incorporate the scoring model details directly in the methodology section

issues.title: Appendix B referenced but not included
issues.description: Document references 'Appendix B for country list' but appendix is not included. Cannot determine which countries qualify as emerging markets
issues.original_text: see Appendix B for country list
issues.suggested_fix: List emerging market countries directly or include Appendix B

issues.title: Appendix C referenced but not included
issues.description: Detailed scoring methodology in Appendix C is not included, making implementation impossible
issues.original_text: Detailed scoring methodology is provided in Appendix C
issues.suggested_fix: Include Appendix C with complete scoring formulas and examples

issues.title: Inflation rate source and calculation not specified
issues.description: Document requires 'dividend growth rate greater than inflation rate' but doesn't specify which inflation measure or data source
issues.original_text: Dividend growth rate greater than inflation rate
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Dividend growth rate greater than the country-specific Consumer Price Index (CPI) as published by the IMF World Economic Outlook database'

missing_documents.referenced_name: Appendix B - Emerging Market Country List
missing_documents.purpose: Defines which countries qualify as emerging markets
Provides detailed scoring formulas and calculations
